item.trinket.str_talisman.name: Bull's Pendant
item.trinket.str_talisman.description: A small bull carved out of sun-bleached wood.
item.trinket.dex_talisman.name: Cat's Pendant
item.trinket.dex_talisman.description: A small, black cat.[key.style.break_small]Precisely cut from obsidian and finely polished.
item.trinket.dex_talisman.flavour: The cats' slitted eyes seem to follow you.
item.trinket.con_talisman.name: Bear's Pendant
item.trinket.con_talisman.description: A rugged looking bear, unevenly hewn from an old oak branch.
item.trinket.con_talisman.flavour: Bark seems to be growing back in places.
item.trinket.oil_lantern.name: Oil Lantern
item.trinket.oil_lantern.description:
Cast's [key.flavour.important](light) around the wearer when turned on.
Can be placed in the [key.flavour.important](Hotbar).
item.trinket.oil_lantern.flavour: A flame, a mane, a pane of glass - all blowing in the wind.
item.trinket.dead_branch.name: Dead Branch
item.trinket.dead_branch.description: [key.flavour.positive](Negate) the [key.flavour.important](first) instance of [key.mechanic.damage] you would take each floor.
item.trinket.dead_branch.flavour: An old growth from a long forgotten tree.
item.trinket.knuckle_dusters.name: Knuckle Dusters
item.trinket.knuckle_dusters.description: [key.flavour.positive](Increase) the [key.mechanic.damage] you deal with [key.item_tag.fists] by [key.variable.static](2) and [key.flavour.positive](reduce) the [key.mechanic.damage] you take while [key.mechanic.block](Blocking) with your [key.item_tag.fists] by [key.variable.static](35%)
item.trinket.knuckle_dusters.flavour: From a simpler time, a keepsake from your youth.
item.trinket.lucky_coin.name: Lucky Coin
item.trinket.lucky_coin.description: The face of the King has been all but worn away.
item.trinket.lucky_coin.flavour: A fare for a ware - tis a baragain see, a tale as old as rhyme.
item.trinket.broken_crystal.name: Broken Crystal
item.trinket.broken_crystal.description: After using a [key.mechanic.fountain], [key.flavour.positive](gain) [key.variable.static](50) [key.mechanic.experience] and consume this item.
item.trinket.broken_crystal.flavour:
A gem, said to have come from the lowest depths of [key.flavour.dungeon](Velmorren).
Whatever lustre it once held is long since faded.
item.trinket.cracked_lodestone.name: Cracked Lodestone
item.trinket.cracked_lodestone.descripti: Slightly [key.flavour.positive](increases) the amount of [key.flavour.important](loot) found in the [key.flavour.dungeon].
item.trinket.cracked_lodestone.flavour: Alchemists say lodestones bear no touch of magic - but whatever makes a geode like this can surely not be natural.
item.trinket.herbal_pouch.name: Herbal Pouch
item.trinket.herbal_pouch.flavour:
Many times you have applied medicines like these to your wounds.
Cut flesh and blackened eyes - a balm for all.
item.trinket.old_locket.name: Old Locket
item.trinket.old_locket.description: Contains the faded silver emulsion of a lost love.
item.trinket.old_locket.flavour:
Time doesn't heal all wounds.
Sometimes you simply keep growing, and they take up less of you.
item.trinket.preserved_leeches.name: Preserved Leeches
item.trinket.preserved_leeches.flavour: Suspened forms gently float within their formaldehyde coffin.
item.trinket.worn_pommel.name: Worn Pommel
item.trinket.worn_pommel.description: From your sparring days - a remnant of the weapon you trained with.
item.trinket.worn_pommel.flavour: Life has brought you far from home, but your muscles remember their purpose.
item.trinket.bone_necklace.name: Rattling Choker
